title: Please Help: Computer Restarts Once My Champion Appears In Summoners Rift
body: So i've been having this problem for about 3 weeks. I pick a champion, game starts loading, and right when i get into summoners rift and everyone has loaded in my PC shuts down, waits 3 seconds, than turns back on. By the time I reconnect to the game, it shuts down again and says "try to play another game" error message. and by that time  everyone has voted for rematch and i lose IP and now have 20 minute wait times to get in game.  I've checked my Temps and my GPU never gets above 75 degrees F. and my CPU hasn't been running hot. My PC is quite old though. Intel Quad core 6600, 6gb ddr2 memory. nvidia 9800gtx+ oc, windows 7. I've been playing this game for about 3 years with this machine though, and for the most part it hasn't had a problem. Any help would be greatly appreciated (:.

replies.body:
Hmm... This could be a sign there are hardware issues or physical failure going on somewhere. To ensure it isn't something silly like a bad driver or background program, I recommend working through our [Bugsplat & Crash guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps caused any positive change.
I am having the same problem, but every game or normal applications I use is normal doesnt crash.

In that case, I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run a set of system logs with our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your ticket, you'll expedite your service time.

Let me know if you have any questions.
